sections.paragraph: மாட்டாது, முன்னே, வீண், மெய்யாகவே, ஆ, கிடையாமல், ஒழிய, நிச்சயம், இல்லை, அல்ல - எச்சம்

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: lo; a primitive particle; not (the simple or abstract negation); by implication no; often used with other particles: - X before, + or else, ere, + except, ig [-norant], much, less, nay, neither, never, no ([-ne], -r, [-thing]), (X as though . . . , [can-], for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, + surely, + as truly as, + of a truth, + verily, for want, + whether, without.
Cognate: H3808, H3810, H3818, H3819
